title: Relocate Underused Pods
description: Pods in Olaias show low turnover. Move 2 pods to Moscavide to capture unmet demand.

title: Dynamic Pricing Trial
description: Demand at IADE peaks from 12–3 PM. Implement a 1.25x price surge during these hours.

title: Maintenance Window Suggestion
description: POD-BKT-008A shows repeated voltage drops after 21:00. Schedule preventive maintenance overnight.
